name: XWUI Dropdown Menu Component
description: Dropdown menu component triggered by button or action. Supports click or hover triggers, various placements and alignments, nested menus, icons, and separators. Uses XWUIItemGroup internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

trigger.description: How to trigger the dropdown menu

placement.description: Placement of the menu relative to trigger

align.description: Alignment of the menu relative to trigger

closeOnSelect.description: Whether to close menu when an item is selected

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the dropdown menu

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of menu items to display

id.description: Unique identifier for the menu item

label.description: Label text for the menu item

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string for the menu item

disabled.description: Whether the menu item is disabled

divider.description: Whether this item is a divider/separator

triggerElement.description: Trigger element or selector string to attach the dropdown to
